Class EnemyProjectile

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.GameObject
sk.stuba.fiit.entities.Entity
sk.stuba.fiit.projectiles.Projectile
sk.stuba.fiit.projectiles.EnemyProjectile
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Cloneable, Damageable, Mortal
public class EnemyProjectile extends Projectile implements Damageable, Mortal
Represents an enemy projectile in the game. It extends the Projectile class and implements Damageable and Mortal interfaces. The class handles the behavior of enemy projectiles, including applying effects, dealing damage to targets, and handling the death of the projectile.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemyProjectile

      public EnemyProjectile(String name, String description, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, int health, int maxHealth, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 direction, float speed, int damage, int price)
      Constructor for creating a new enemy projectile with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the enemy projectile
      description - the description of the enemy projectile
      texture - the texture for the enemy projectile
      health - the initial health of the enemy projectile
      maxHealth - the maximum health of the enemy projectile
      direction - the direction in which the enemy projectile moves
      speed - the speed at which the enemy projectile moves
      damage - the amount of damage the enemy projectile deals
      price - the price of the enemy projectile

      the EffectHandler managing the projectile's effects

    • attack

      public void attack(Damageable target, int damage)
      Attacks a target with the given damage using the projectile's attacker.
      Parameters:
      target - the target to attack
      damage - the amount of damage to deal

    • die

      public void die()
      Handles the death of the enemy projectile. It marks the projectile as not alive and invokes an event for the enemy's death.
      Specified by:
      die in interface Mortal

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Takes damage and reduces the health of the enemy projectile. If health reaches zero, the projectile dies.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Damageable
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to take

    • clone

      public Projectile clone()
      Creates a clone of the enemy projectile, including its effects and properties.
      Specified by:
      clone in class Projectile
      Returns:
      a cloned EnemyProjectile object

    • onCollision

      public void onCollision(Entity collisionEntity)
      Handles the collision of the enemy projectile with another entity. If the projectile collides with a Player, it will deal damage to the player and then destroy the projectile.
      Specified by:
      onCollision in class Projectile
      Parameters:
      collisionEntity - the entity with which the projectile collides
